message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,050,000. It's a fair price considering its value to you. I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for your business. Let me know your thoughts.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am unable to meet the price of $1,050,000. I am willing to pay up to $950,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your position. However, $950,000 is simply too low for me to accept at this time.  I'm willing to meet you halfway.  I'll lower my price to $1,000,000, which is still a fair price considering the value of the product to you.  Let's see if we can close this deal.
